description: This file sets up a reasoning agent using OpenAI's GPT-4 model to analyze a scientific paper abstract and print a detailed response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent capable of performing reasoning tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing an OpenAI chat model interface.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the agent's response to a given task, with options for streaming and detailed reasoning.
